How it Works
01
Book Consultation or WhatsApp us at +91-9360397461 and book a free consultation
02
Receive EstimateOur expert will get in touch with you to understand your requirements and clear all your doubts before providing a detailed initial estimate for your construction plans
03
Commence DesignOnce the booking agreement is signed; land survey will be done and our architects will design the floor plans till your satisfaction followed by elevation design as per your taste. Soil testing will be done at site simultaneously to initiate structural design.
04
Sign Main Agreement Transparent final costing is provided once all the drawings and material specifications are finalized by you, following which the main agreement containing all agreed terms will be signed. Project schedule and payment schedule will also be provided to help you track progress and plan your finances accordingly
05
Start Site ExecutionWork begins on site. Regular progress updates with photographs will be shared from site and quality will be monitored continuously till completion. You can sit back and relax even after handover since we provide warranties for the works done.
Why Choose Us
End To End ServiceBuilding approvals, architectural design, structural design, site execution, Interiors and professional project management.
In-house Architects & EngineersWe do not outsource any work. Our in house team of experienced architects and engineers will ensure your custom home construction is completed as planned
Upfront Cost TransparencyOur Pricing is flexible, transparent and based on your budget. You will receive detailed costing based on actual built up area calculations and specification selected.
On-time CompletionYou will receive a detailed project schedule at the very beginning and we will ensure that the timelines are followed diligently till completion and handover. The timelines are documented in the agreements.
Project TrackingYou will be given regular updates along with photographic evidence from site so that you do not have to visit the site everyday. All the drawings, invoices and documents related to your project will be made available in a single easy-to-access digital location.
Quality ControlWe follow QuaSet; a thorough 350+ point Quality control checklist to ensure that your home gets the top most level of workmanship using only branded material approved by you.
WarrantiesWe will make sure you will never need to use these warranties. Just to give you peace of mind, we provide warranties on the following: 10 year structural warranty and 1 year seepage rectification from the time of completion.
What Makes Us Different
Building a home is one of the biggest financial investments for anyone. We understand this and have incorporated several practices to safeguard and futureproof this investment. Click on know more to understand how we differentiate an ordinary construction from a SuperHome.
Super Detailing
Concealed AC pipes

Visible AC copper and drain pipes spoil the visual aesthetics of a building. If AC locations are decided earlier, we plan the piping to conceal these pipes effectively.

Provisions for inverter

Unforeseen power cuts are still faced by many. Inverter provisions are given as per your requirements and preference.

Centralized AC stabilizers

AC stabilizers are an eyesore when placed in every room. We plan and place all the stabilizers in one location hidden away from view.

Concealed CCTV line

CCTV is a must for the security of every home. Most houses install this at a later stage and have wires and pipes running all around the house. We plan CCTV locations and provide dedicated concealed conduits in advance to avoid this.

Pressure Motor provision

Most of the latest shower fittings require a minimum amount of water pressure to function properly, especially on the top floor with the tank immediately above. We provide the necessary plumbing and electrical provisions for installation of pressure motors.

Solar Panel/Heater provision

Solar panels or a solar heater can be installed on the rooftop. This is not only eco friendly, it also reduces the burden of high electricity costs.

Bathroom Niches

Protruding plastic/metal/glass shelves in bathrooms are a thing of the past. They get damaged and have to be replaced periodically. Niches in the walls serve the same purpose; they blend seamlessly into the overall design and require no extra maintenance or replacement.

Senior citizen friendly bathrooms

It is essential for senior citizens to have a fall-free and comfortable experience every time they use bathrooms. We will design and incorporate items so that the elderly in your house will be relaxed.

EV Charging point

Electric vehicles are going to be the future. We provide dedicated EV vehicle charging points in the parking area to future proof your house.

Super Practices
Damp proof course

A damp proof course is a type of treatment done at the plinth level, to prevent dampness from the ground entering the structure through capillary action.

Termite Treatment

Anti termite chemical treatment is done in two levels. Once at the footing level and once at the plinth level to ensure that your furniture and woodwork is protected from termite damage.

Rain water harvesting

Rainwater harvesting is mandatory for all buildings. We offer two types of RWH, a groundwater recharge pit where the terrace rainwater is directed into a filtration pit or we install a water filter and direct the terrace rainwater through it into a collection tank/sump

Concrete additive for Roof Slab

The top slab is one area that is prone to water seepage. We use conplast additive for top slab concreting. This minimises the permeability and increases waterproofing properties of concrete to ensure there is no scope for any seepage.

Waterproofing

We ensure all our concrete and masonry work is flawless but we still provide two stage waterproofing treatment on all sunken areas and on the terrace as a secondary precaution, just to give you peace of mind.

Curing compound for wall plastering

A layer of curing compound is applied on external plaster surfaces. It prevents rapid moisture loss from newly plastered walls. This helps in preventing plaster surfaces from cracking due to shrinkage

Tile Flooring with spacers

All tiles are recommended to be laid with spacer joints to act as expansion joints, to minimize tile joint lippage and also to allow repairs to be done in the future if needed. We provide this at no extra cost to you.

Parapet wall coping

Coping is a layer of protection added to the top of parapet walls to keep water out and prevent weather damage.

Mesh plastering in joints

Chicken mesh plastering is done for all brick and concrete joints, to prevent cracks forming due to the difference in thermal expansion of each material.

Epoxy grouting in Bathrooms

Epoxy resin grout is a material that hardens and forms a complete waterproof seal between tile joints. It is also stain proof, extremely durable and can withstand use of harsh cleaning products.
